Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne ewe shiwali ebuleka wemumbo olwa khwayilila Musa amalomesio ne shiwali mubalia baliho tawe
Halali efwe khwaloonga emikanda eminji ne emika nichibabeela eminji, ne shiwali omumenyanwa nende Abandu ba Madyana tawe, osomanga khubo tsinyaali tsiefu halali nefwe khwatsishinjia

Nohomba ewe shiwali ebuleka we shikulu owakhwamulanjila tawe, halali nitsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwo kho wikanyilisilie abandu bashili okhulilwa nende Omwikanyilisi, ewe noshili okhwitsa, bakhaba bario betsulila

Ne kaletsa okhubanyoola amasila khukalia kemikhono chiabu chiaranjilisia, mana baboole mbu: “ Nyasaye wefu! Shichila shina nalakhurumila efwe omurumwa khwaloonda tsinyaali tsitsio mana khwaba mubalia basuubila.?”

Halali olwa obwatoto bwabetsela okhurula khwifwe, baboola mbu: “shichila shina nalahebwa shingala kalia aka Musa yahebwa?” koo shibakakhaya tawe kalia aka Musa yahebwa khale, mana nibaboola mbu:” abalosi babili baloleshe,” ne nibaboola mbu: “toto efwe mukabu koosi khubakhayile.”
Boola mbu: “ mana nekhamurere eshitabo okhurula khu Nyasaye eshili nende obulunjifu obulayi muno okhushila bibili bino eshiloonde, toto nimuli ababoolanga obwatoto.”

Ne nibalakhukalusia tawe , kho manya mbu bo baloondanga butswa obwikombi bwe emioyo chiabu. Ne niwina wakora muno okhushila ulia uloondanga obwikombi bwomwoyo kukwe, obubula obulunjifu oburulanga khu Nyasaye. Toto Nyasaye shalunjisinjia Abandu ababii tawe
